description: These crying eyes are a little less freaky and these kaomojis all use them. The tears look droopy, like they are kind of stuck in the eye and might even go back inside. Weird! Notice how an emoticon even has the word “omg!!” written beside it. This is a perfect example of how you can add words to virtually any emoticon for added effect. ૮( ꒦ິ⍣꒦ີ)ა (๑꒦ິ ̼ ꒦ິ๑) ૮(꒦ິཅ꒦ິ)ა (꒦ິ⍸꒦ິ) (*꒦ິ⌓꒦ີ) (*꒦ິ꒦ີ) (*꒦ິ³꒦ີ) (*꒦ິ꒳꒦ີ) (*꒦ິㅂ꒦ີ) (*꒦ິㅿ꒦ີ) | ू*꒦ິ꒳꒦ີ)｡oO (꒦໊ྀʚ꒦໊ི )
title: ꒦ິ Style Tears
